Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Ardmore
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Bryn Mawr, California, Peterson & Kimball, due to street blockage near Kimball/Ardmore

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kimball, Bryn Mawr, California, Peterson, then resume their normal route at Kimball, due to street blockage near Kimball/Ardmore

Allow extra travel time.
